about.heading: About AirLink
about.text: Georgian AirLink internet provider company. we offer you Internet and telecommunication services according to modern standards. All products are tailored to the customer's interests and individual requirements. Georgian AirLink`s primary goal is to provide customers with innovative and demand oriented Internet packages and various high quality communication services. კThe goal of the company is to establish a leader in the telecommunications space, achieving maximum customer interest, offering innovative products, introducing new services, increasing market share and profitability. Our offered product enables users to obtain high quality Internet (TV) at the most affordable prices in the Georgian market.
